programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: It's Bread Week, and the bakers make pull-apart monkey bread, a fast food Technical and a sweet bread Showstopper. Who'll rise to the top and who kneads to dust themselves off?

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Extract Obliteration: Sheldon is thrilled when Stephen Hawking agrees to play against him in an online game. Penny signs up for a class at the community college.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Habitation Configuration: Amy is upset when Sheldon fails to defend her in an argument with Wil Wheaton during the filming of a new episode of Fun with Flags.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The 43 Peculiarity: The guys notice that Sheldon disappears for 20 minutes after lunch every day. Filled with curiosity, they attempt to work out what he's been doing.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Parking Spot Escalation: When non-driver Sheldon finds out that his unused parking space at the university has been reallocated to Howard, he feels undermined.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Fish Guts Displacement: Sheldon begrudgingly takes care of Amy when she is sick. Bernadette arranges for Howard to go on a fishing trip with her macho father.

programme.title: The Simpsons Say I D'oh
programme.desc: A Milhouse Divided: When Milhouse's parents split up, his mum gets together with an American Gladiator called Pyro, his dad self-produces an album and Milhouse goes a bit crazy.

programme.title: The Simpsons Say I D'oh
programme.desc: A Star Is Born Again: A famous and sultry movie star (guest star Marisa Tomei) swoops into town with eyes for none other than Ned Flanders, making him the envy of Springfield.

programme.title: The Simpsons Say I D'oh
programme.desc: The Good, the Sad and the Drugly: A volunteer inspires Bart to become a better person. Lisa writes an essay about what Springfield will be like in 50 years' time.

programme.title: The Simpsons Say I D'oh
programme.desc: The 7 Beer Itch: When Marge and the kids take a seaside holiday, Homer is unwittingly tempted by a British femme fatale (Olivia Colman).

programme.title: The Simpsons Say I D'oh
programme.desc: The Dad-Feelings Limited: As Comic Book Guy and his wife Kumiko debate whether to have a baby, his awesome origin story is revealed.

programme.title: New: Lego Masters Australia
programme.desc: Brand new series - Batman: The teams create iconic vehicles for notorious Batman villains, from The Joker to Harley Quinn. Whose badass build will send them to the semi-final?

programme.title: Sister Act 2: Back in the Habit
programme.desc: (1993) Comedy sequel starring Whoopi Goldberg and Lauryn Hill. Deloris - who's now made it big in Vegas - goes back undercover as a teacher to help a struggling school choir find its voice.

programme.title: New: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: Brand new series: MAFS UK is back, as a fresh batch of singles marry strangers! Our first couples get wed, but will an unexpected surprise and a potential ick threaten harmony?

programme.title: New: MAFS UK: It's Official!...
programme.desc: ...With Lucinda Light: Brand new series - The MAFS UK podcast is back! Danny Beard joins Lucinda for marriage mayhem, as they dissect all the drama from the biggest MAFS moments.

programme.title: Virgin Island
programme.desc: More people are remaining virgins for longer, but now 12 courageous adult virgins embark on a unique intimacy course, at a luxury island retreat, to overcome their intimacy anxiety. (Ep1)

programme.title: Open House: The Great Sex...
programme.desc: ...Experiment: Nicolle and Ben spice things up, but is Nicolle as happy with the night's climax as she appears? Thrill-seekers Katey and Dan pursue a live sex show experience.

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: Brand new series: MAFS UK is back, as a fresh batch of singles marry strangers! Our first couples get wed, but will an unexpected surprise and a potential ick threaten harmony?

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Relentless optimist Charlie has a heart-to-heart with emotional osteopath Benji. And will single mum Rachel be happy to roll with divorced toilet paper salesman Stephen?

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Weathering Heights: Phil's excited when he's invited onto the local news. And his day gets even better when he meets his weatherman hero, Rainer Shine (guest star Nathan Fillion).

programme.title: Hollyoaks Omnibus
programme.desc: Leela worries about Ste while Dillon jumps to conclusions. Jez plans a memorial for Sienna. A shocking discovery is made in a missing persons case. And Tom helps Tony adapt to prison life.

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: There's a shocking discovery in a missing person's case. Tom helps Tony to adapt to prison life. And a resident gets backed into a corner...

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Tony feels disheartened behind bars, but will the return of a familiar face help? Meanwhile, a secret becomes too heavy for one resident to hold.

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube Shorts
programme.desc: A short, cheeky clip from Rude Tube's naughty little sister, Rude(ish) Tube, featuring sports of the lawnmower, motorbike and bicycle variety.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Lido Di Manhattan: Ambitious graduate Lisa bought her restaurant in California at just 23 but, five years later, she's worried she picked the wrong venture. Can Gordon help?

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: Brand new series: MAFS UK is back, as a fresh batch of singles marry strangers! Our first couples get wed, but will an unexpected surprise and a potential ick threaten harmony?

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Dangerous Curves: Homer and Marge head to a log cabin for the weekend and reminisce about their early courtship.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Date Night Variable: Howard gets caught in a row between his mum and Bernadette while he's at the International Space Station. Sheldon invites Raj along on a date with Amy.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Decoupling Fluctuation: Sheldon intervenes when he learns that Penny is thinking about breaking up with Leonard, but he's hampered by his inability to keep a secret.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Travels with Scout: When Phil's dad turns up in a mobile home with a little four-legged friend, Claire thinks he might be hiding an ulterior motive for his visit.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Airport 2010: For Jay's birthday, Gloria surprises him with a getaway to Hawaii - but she's invited the whole family. And there's no greater test than travelling with the family.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Closet Reconfiguration: When Howard and Bernadette get Sheldon to organise their untidy closet, Sheldon finds an unopened letter from Howard's long-absent father.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Tenure Turbulence: Leonard, Sheldon, Raj and Kripke all compete for the same vacancy at the university.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Closure Alternative: Amy employs a series of exercises to cure Sheldon of his compulsion to complete every task without fail and seek closure for every incident.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Proton Resurgence: Leonard and Sheldon hire Professor Proton, the host of a TV science show they watched as children, to come to their flat and entertain them.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: The Audit: The squad panic when they learn that the precinct could be closed if they get a bad evaluation. And to make matters worse, their auditor's Amy's ex, Teddy.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Serve & Protect: A burglary on the set of a TV detective show distracts Peralta and Diaz from the precinct's ongoing evaluation as a new auditor takes over.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: In the Name of the Grandfather: Homer takes the family to Ireland so that Grampa can visit quaint village pub O'Flanagan's one last time.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Wedding for Disaster: Homer and Marge discover that they're not officially married when Reverend Lovejoy finds out he wasn't a licensed minister at the time of their ceremony.

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: Brand new series: MAFS UK is back, as a fresh batch of singles marry strangers! Our first couples get wed, but will an unexpected surprise and a potential ick threaten harmony?

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube Shorts
programme.desc: A short, cheeky clip from Rude Tube's naughty little sister that features a variety of cats doing strange things, some soldiers stuck in the sand and a dog balancing on a rope.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart to the Future: Bart foresees his adult future as a struggling rock guitarist crashing on Ralph Wiggum's couch, while Lisa becomes President.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Days of Wine and D'Oh'ses: After forgetting his birthday party, Barney quits drinking and takes helicopter flying lessons.

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Darren's world turns upside down, while Diane is forced to face her true feelings for Tony. And a resident has a huge decision to make...

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: A Star Is Born Again: A famous and sultry movie star (guest star Marisa Tomei) swoops into town with eyes for none other than Ned Flanders, making him the envy of Springfield.

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Medical student Alice dates Max, the self-styled 'Wolf of Wallington High Street'. Veteran house music groover Mark meets Alison, a call centre worker by day and raver by night.

programme.title: New: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: Brand new series: There's a showstopping entrance and a major wobble as more strangers say 'I do'. And our first newly-weds jet off on their honeymoons, but are cracks forming?

programme.title: New: Made in Chelsea: Thailand
programme.desc: Brand new series: Jules is livid as Molly infiltrates the group and hooks up with Tristan's bestie Chuggs. Beks kisses Freddy's best mate. And Livvy admits her eyes have wandered.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: The leading news stories of the moment.

programme.title: Morbius
programme.desc: (2022) Dark Marvel superhero fantasy with Jared Leto and Matt Smith. A science genius turns himself and his mate into vampires. But his mate's a naughty one and must be neutralised.

programme.title: The Hate U Give
programme.desc: (2018) Drama with Amandla Stenberg, based on Angie Thomas's novel. A young Black woman's friend is shot dead after they are pulled over. Can she find the courage to take on the police?

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Wonder Park
programme.desc: (2019) Animated adventure featuring the voices of Jennifer Garner, Mila Kunis, John Oliver and Matthew Broderick. A girl's imaginary theme park comes to life when her mum goes to hospital.

programme.title: Born Free
programme.desc: (1966) Gem of a family drama based on a true story. After a life in captivity, can lioness Elsa learn to survive in the wild? Starring Virginia McKenna and John Barry's Oscar-winning score.

programme.title: Babe: Pig in the City
programme.desc: (1998) Charming family comedy sequel. The farm's in trouble and only a sheep-herding pig can save the day. But after a customs mix-up, Babe ends up in a boarding house for lost animals...

programme.title: The Devil Wears Prada
programme.desc: (2006) Comedy-drama starring Anne Hathaway and Meryl Streep. A naive young woman lands a job as assistant to one of New York's most important, but ruthless and cynical, magazine editors.

programme.title: Jumanji: The Next Level
programme.desc: (2019) Adventure comedy sequel with Dwayne Johnson, Jack Black, Kevin Hart and Karen Gillan. The old school pals enter the Jumanji video game again to save their friend.

programme.title: The Mechanic
programme.desc: (2011) Thriller with Jason Statham and Donald Sutherland. A hitman is ordered to kill his mentor, but then takes on the dead man's son as an apprentice. Could get complicated... and deadly.

programme.title: Die Hard
programme.desc: (1988) Action-thriller with Bruce Willis and Alan Rickman. Can a New York cop free the hostages being held in a skyscraper by an arch villain? Yippee ki-yay... whoops, can't say that here.

programme.title: Ravenous
programme.desc: (1999) Darkly comic horror with Guy Pearce and Robert Carlyle. In 1840s California, an American soldier with a taste for human flesh struggles to stay clean in the face of bad influence.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Kind Hearts and Coronets
programme.desc: (1949) This dark comedy from Ealing studios sees Alec Guinness take on the roles of eight characters, all the noble victims of a vengeance-seeking relative, played by Dennis Price.

programme.title: Think Like a Dog
programme.desc: (2020) Cheeky comedy with Megan Fox. A young science prodigy (Gabriel Bateman) invents a piece of tech that lets him and his pet dog communicate with each other telepathically.

programme.title: Dunston Checks In
programme.desc: (1996) Comedy starring Faye Dunaway and Rupert Everett. A hotel owner's attempt to upgrade her star rating is undermined by the arrival of a master thief and his light-fingered orangutan.

programme.title: Secret Headquarters
programme.desc: (2022) Family comedy with Michael Pea. A young lad discovers that his slacker dad is a superhero. And before he's got used to the idea, he must foil a villain's plot to bring his dad down.

programme.title: Fisherman's Friends
programme.desc: (2019) Heart-warming comedy based on the real-life story of the Cornish folk ensemble who took the UK charts by storm in 2010, starring Daniel Mays and Tuppence Middleton.

programme.title: Wild Card
programme.desc: (2015) Sin City thriller with Jason Statham. A compulsive gambler who does favours for money just wants out of the Vegas life. Just one big win at the tables should do it...

programme.title: Glass
programme.desc: (2019) M. Night Shyamalan directs an all-star cast in this genre-bending superhero sequel. Three superhumans team up to escape a psychiatric ward. With Bruce Willis in a cagoule.

programme.title: Benjamin
programme.desc: (2018) Simon Amstell's bittersweet comedy romance stars Colin Morgan as a young filmmaker angsting over his second feature when he falls for a French music student.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: LumoTV: Sign2Win
programme.desc: Relationships are put to test as colleagues, sisters, and a married couple battle it out for 1,000. Will their nerves hold up under the pressure of these five games?

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The Winslow Boy
programme.desc: (1948) Anthony Asquith's drama based on a famous 1912 court case with Cedric Hardwicke as the father of a boy accused of theft who pursues the case to the highest courts. With Robert Donat.

programme.title: The 300 Spartans
programme.desc: (1962) Historical drama with Ralph Richardson. A retelling of the stand made at Thermopylae in 480 BC by a small Greek force against invasion by an enormous Persian army.

programme.title: The Devil at 4 O'Clock
programme.desc: (1961) Drama. Spencer Tracy stars as an unfairly unpopular priest living on a volcanic South Sea island which is about to erupt. With Kerwin Matthews, Frank Sinatra and Barbara Luna.

programme.title: Midway
programme.desc: (2019) Roland Emmerich's sprawling, action-packed war drama about the Battle of Midway, a major turning point in World War II. Starring Ed Skrein, Luke Evans and Woody Harrelson.

programme.title: Infinite
programme.desc: (2021) Sci-fi action. Mark Wahlberg discovers that his hallucinations are memories from past lives. There are others like him, but they don't all have good intentions...

programme.title: Team America: World Police
programme.desc: (2004) Outrageous satirical comedy from the South Park team. A crack team of puppets battle to save the world from an evil terrorist plot hatched by North Korean leader Kim Jong Il.

programme.title: Legion
programme.desc: (2010) Apocalyptic action-horror starring Paul Bettany. God's patience runs out and He decides to wipe humanity from the face of the Earth. Can a rebel archangel save us?

programme.title: Morbius
programme.desc: (2022) Dark Marvel superhero fantasy with Jared Leto and Matt Smith. A science genius turns himself and his mate into vampires. But his mate's a naughty one and must be neutralised.
